title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

title: Jumanji
description: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

title: Grumpier Old Men
description: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.

title: Waiting to Exhale
description: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with men.

title: Father of the Bride Part II
description: George Banks must deal not only with his daughter's pregnancy, but also with his wife's.

title: Heat
description: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: Sabrina
description: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

title: Tom and Huck
description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

title: Sudden Death
description: A former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

title: GoldenEye
description: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a Russian crime syndicate steals a secret space-based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" and James Bond has to stop t... Read all

title: The American President
description: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

title: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
description: Mel Brooks ' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

title: Balto
description: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

title: Nixon
description: A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.

title: Cutthroat Island
description: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

title: Casino
description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fas... Read all

title: Sense and Sensibility
description: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

title: Four Rooms
description: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
description: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

title: Money Train
description: A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.
